subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Coach Charlie Weis will take over offensive coordinator duties for Notre Dame next season. The defensive coordinator Corwin Brown will share the title of defensive coordinator with Jon Tenuta. Weis also announced other changes in roles sparked by his decision to call plays on offense as he did for his first three seasons before handing the duties last season over to Mike Haywood, now the head coach at Miami of Ohio.
